T01D1131:80a-1: a'a rya bha n'a ra ka ma nydzu shr'i pa ra ma aa rtha stu ti n'a ma /
T01D1131:80a-3: 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba //
T01D1131:80a-4: 'jam dpal gzon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1131:80a-5: byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga' //
T01D1131:80a-6: bzhengs pa ma lags bzhugs mi mnga' //
T01D1131:80a-8: tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags //
T01D1131:80a-9: mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod //
T01D1131:80a-11: khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du //
T01D1131:80a-12: bdag gis gus pas bla ma bstod //
T01D1131:80a-13: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te //
T01D1131:80a-14: khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga' //
T01D1131:80a-15: mgon po gshegs dang byon mi mnga' //
T01D1131:80a-16: dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80a-17: khyod la dngos dang dngos med min //
T01D1131:80a-18: chad pa ma lags ther zug min //
T01D1131:80a-19: khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min //
T01D1131:80a-20: gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-0: dmar dang ljang dang le @80b brgan dang //
T01D1131:80b-1: ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags //
T01D1131:80b-2: khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga' //
T01D1131:80b-3: mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-4: khyod ni che dang chung ba dang /
T01D1131:80b-5: sbom dang phra ba khyod min te //
T01D1131:80b-6: ring dang thung ba'i khams ma lags //
T01D1131:80b-7: tshad med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-8: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T01D1131:80b-9: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
T01D1131:80b-11: mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-12: chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing //
T01D1131:80b-13: chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud //
T01D1131:80b-14: mchog tu zab pa nyid brten pa //
T01D1131:80b-15: zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-16: de ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi //
T01D1131:80b-17: gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod //
T01D1131:80b-18: chos rnams thams cad stong pa la //
T01D1131:80b-19: su la bstod cing su yis bstod //
T01D1131:80b-20: mtha' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis //
T01D1131:80b-21: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i //
T01D1131:80b-22: rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T01D1131:80b-23: bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
T01D1131:80b-24: don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'o //
T01D1131:80b-26: bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog /'phags pa rje
T01D1131:80b-27: btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes
T01D1131:80b-28: bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal
